text: Jaws 2 is an American adventure horror thriller movie. It is the first sequel to Steven Spielberg's Jaws (1975). It was released in 1978.Joseph McBride, Steven Spielberg: A Biography (New York: Da Capo Press, 1999), p. 257 It is the second in the Jaws series of movies. These are based on Peter Benchley's Jaws novel of the same name. Directed by Jeannot Szwarc, Jaws 2 stars Roy Scheider as Police Chief Martin Brody.Diane C. Kachmar, Roy Scheider: A Film Biography (Jefferson, NC: McFarland, 2002), pp. 75â€“76 He has to deal with another great white shark terrorizing the waters of Amity Island, a fictional seaside resort. Jaws 2 was followed by Jaws 3-D (1983) and Jaws: The Revenge (released in 1987). == References == Category:1978 horror movies Category:1978 thriller movies Category:1978 adventure movies Category:1970s horror thriller movies Category:American sequel movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:Jaws movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in Massachusetts Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Jeannot Szwarc Category:Movies about sharks Category:Movies set on beaches Category:Movies set on islands
title: Jaws 2
